com.facebook.buck.core.rules.actions

Class DefaultActionRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.artifact.BuildArtifactFactory
      • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.actions.DefaultActionRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionRegistry

    public class DefaultActionRegistry
extends BuildArtifactFactory
implements ActionRegistry
    The action registry that should be used throughout Buck to handle registering actions.

        Parameters:
        buildTarget - the BuildTarget for which all of the Actions created are for
        actionRegistry - the ActionAnalysisDataRegistry that all actions created are registered to

        public Artifact declareArtifact(String output,
                                com.google.devtools.build.lib.events.Location location)
                         throws ArtifactDeclarationException
        Description copied from interface: ActionRegistry
        Simple helper behaves like ActionRegistry.declareArtifact(Path, Location), but validates that the string is a valid path
        Specified by:
        declareArtifact in interface ActionRegistry
        Parameters:
        output - the output path relative to the package path for hte current rule that the Actions are being created for
        location - if provided, the location within the extension file where this artifact was declared
        Returns:
        a Artifact for hte given path
        Throws:
        ArtifactDeclarationException - if the provided output path is invalid

      • registerActionAnalysisDataForAction

        public String registerActionAnalysisDataForAction(Action action)
                                           throws ActionCreationException
        Description copied from interface: ActionRegistry
        Creates the ActionWrapperData from its Action and registers the ActionWrapperData to the ActionAnalysisDataRegistry.

        This will materialize the declared Artifacts and bind them to the action. These Artifacts that can be passed via Providers to be consumed.

        Specified by:
        registerActionAnalysisDataForAction in interface ActionRegistry
        Parameters:
        action - the Action to create an ActionWrapperData for and registers it
        Returns:
        the assigned unique ID for this Action
        Throws:
        ActionCreationException

        Specified by:

        Returns:
